reviewComments: Just drove down to see the sunset and landed here. Rugged and beautiful and the sunset was amazing. Seals and crabbers and the whole works and beautiful homes.

Nice beach..not very crowded..sand is nice and soft..again view of ocean is awesome..nice place to visit...

reviewComments: From comfy chaises, club chairs and recliners to red wine and popcorn. Does it get any better than this?
What a great concept! Sit back and relax in a roomy leather recliner. Order a cheese and fruit platter and some wine and you're set for your most enjoyable movie experience ever.

reviewComments: The Pedego E Bikes are the number one bikes.We bought two city commuters and just love them.Very well made and so much fun to ride.The best ever!!!!!

reviewComments: I had some time to spare and enjoyed a walk through Sherman Gardens. Lovely spacer in the heart of Corona del Mar.
a welcoming respite from noisy pacific coast highway and the ever crowded Newport beach city. The gardens are breathtaking and the food very pleasant and reasonable.
Stop by, maybe sit on a bench and contemplate life. Great collection of plants.
